title: Caught Offside: Jump to Conclusions '22-'23
description:
Get your mats out, it's that time of the season again- Jump to conclusions week: Are Arsenal title contenders? Are Liverpool going to relinquish their status as the main title challengers? Are Chelsea just not that special?
Plus: World Cup kit critiques, transfer deadline day thoughts and much more!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Caught Offside: Arsenal stay hot while City stay scary
